value:
$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|So, this is Plegia, then. It's as hot
as they said it would be. Are you
all right, Katarina?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|Yes. I'm fine, Kris.$k$pThis Plegian festival is held to honor
the Fell Dragon, Grima—a being of
immense power, I'm told.$k$pIf the point of this festival is to revive
Grima, as members of the Order of
Heroes, it's our duty to stop it.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|You're right. A festival to honor the
Fell Dragon is suspect... We mustn't
let our guards down.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|To that end, I asked Tharja to be our
guide. She's originally from Plegia.$k$pWith her help, we should be able to
infiltrate the festival in secret, without
drawing any suspicion... Follow me.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|Right. Let's go.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_双界ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|Whew... I never thought Plegia would
be quite this hot. I'm going to get
an awkward tan line, I can tell.$k$p$nMPID_リーン|I know... But aren't these outfits
wonderful though? I can hardly
keep from dancing in this!$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|It's a festival so there should be food
stalls here, right? ...Where are they?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_双界ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|Aah! It's just too hot! I have to get
out of this sun. Can we take a break?
I need to cool off.$k$p$Sbs150|
